name: missionary
description: Add or remove someone to the missionary list

options.name: add
options.description: Add someone to the missionary list

options.name: missionary
options.description: The user going on a mission

options.name: privacy
options.description: What the user wants to be removed from their emails

options.name: email
options.description: The primary email that will be sending out the emails

options.name: email2
options.description: An optional second email that could send out the emails

options.name: email3
options.description: An optional third email that could send out the emails

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove someone from the missionary list

options.name: missionary
options.description: The missionary to remove from the missionary list

options.name: list
options.description: Get a list of all current missionaries
